title: Umbrella
summaries: The Umbrella is a held item, and on [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile, a melee weapon as well. It can be found in surface Chests and (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) in Wooden Crates. (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) It can also be purchased for 1 GC from the Skeleton Merchant during a Waning Gibbous.

When held, the Umbrella appears above the character and allows the player to fall at a slower rate. It replicates the effect of the <linked>Featherfall Potion</linked> and prevents <linked>fall damage</linked>.
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Its best modifier is Legendary.

statistics.Damage: 10 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) (Melee)
